channel.title: Writing character files to a SQL Database
channel.description: Does anyone have a tutorial for this/is able to tell me how to do it? I think if anyone does know how to do it, they should write a tutorial for it because the way characters are saved at the moment is the most terrible way to do it possible and I believe that SQL Databases should be a standard for saving info that needs to be kept for every player.

item.title: Writing character files to a SQL Database
item.dc:creator: @cocoa cocoa
